config.title: Configuration
config.client_instruction: Please follow these steps to configure the SMS Forwarder app on your phone:
config.step1_desc: Download and install the SMS Forwarder app from Google Play Store or the official website.
config.step2: 2. Open the app and grant permissions
config.step2_desc: Launch the app and grant necessary permissions, including SMS reading and network access.
config.step3_desc: Add a new forwarding rule in the app, select Webhook type, and enter URL: {{webhookUrl}}
config.step4_desc: Send a test SMS to your phone and confirm that the message is correctly forwarded to the server.
